div.p: The mission of Perry Township Schools is to provide educational opportunities that create a desire for lifelong learning that inspires all students to maximize their academic success.

div.div: Sign up for township news and events.

form.label: Leave this field empty if you're human:

div.span: 🚨 ALERT: All Perry Township Schools, including the Early Childhood Academy, will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year.
